asset_types.name: Motorcycles
asset_types.description: All two or three-wheeled motorized vehicles with saddle type seats and handlebar steering. Includes motorcycles, motor scooters, mopeds, motor-powered bicycles, and three-wheel motorcycles.

asset_types.name: Passenger Cars
asset_types.description: All sedans, coupes, and station wagons manufactured primarily for carrying passengers, including those pulling recreational or light trailers.

asset_types.name: Other Two-Axle, Four-Tire Single Unit Vehicles
asset_types.description: All two-axle, four-tire vehicles other than passenger cars. Includes pickups, panels, vans, campers, motor homes, ambulances, hearses, carryalls, and minibuses.

asset_types.name: Buses
asset_types.description: All traditional passenger-carrying buses with two axles and six tires or three or more axles. Includes school buses functioning as passenger-carrying vehicles.

asset_types.name: Two-Axle, Six-Tire, Single-Unit Trucks
asset_types.description: All vehicles on a single frame with two axles and dual rear wheels. Includes trucks, camping and recreational vehicles, and motor homes.

asset_types.name: Three-Axle Single-Unit Trucks
asset_types.description: All vehicles on a single frame with three axles. Includes trucks, camping and recreational vehicles, and motor homes.

asset_types.name: Four or More Axle Single-Unit Trucks
asset_types.description: All trucks on a single frame with four or more axles.

asset_types.name: Four or Fewer Axle Single-Trailer Trucks
asset_types.description: All vehicles with four or fewer axles consisting of two units, one of which is a tractor or straight truck power unit.

asset_types.name: Five-Axle Single-Trailer Trucks
asset_types.description: All five-axle vehicles consisting of two units, one of which is a tractor or straight truck power unit.

asset_types.name: Six or More Axle Single-Trailer Trucks
asset_types.description: All vehicles with six or more axles consisting of two units, one of which is a tractor or straight truck power unit.

asset_types.name: Five or Fewer Axle Multi-Trailer Trucks
asset_types.description: All vehicles with five or fewer axles consisting of three or more units, one of which is a tractor or straight truck power unit.

asset_types.name: Six-Axle Multi-Trailer Trucks
asset_types.description: All six-axle vehicles consisting of three or more units, one of which is a tractor or straight truck power unit.

asset_types.name: Seven or More Axle Multi-Trailer Trucks
asset_types.description: All vehicles with seven or more axles consisting of three or more units, one of which is a tractor or straight truck power unit.
